sentences.en: In the reorganization, Southern Television lost their franchise.
sentences.cn: 在改组过程中南方电视公司失去了特许经营权。

sentences.en: Reorganization is necessary on the distributive side of this industry.
sentences.cn: 此行业的产品分配环节必需重组。

sentences.en: In his resignation letter, Morgan called the reorganization "unworkable".
sentences.cn: 摩根在辞职信中称，重组是“行不通”的。
